title: (x) Degriz logo wide techno/scifi display face - D3 Euronism {Mike F}
content:
Hey guys. I’m looking for a font used for my companies logo. i have two different images. I used tons of tools and manually searched 1000s of fonts. So I’m turning to you for help.  
Both PSD and font used were lost :S

Thank you in advance. Christian Miklavcic

PS: extra image: [http://www.degriz.net/menu/1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060332/http:/www.degriz.net/menu/1.gif "http://www.degriz.net/menu/1.gif")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060332im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/908cdedb7431161539becfdc00b450bd_4647.29521.jpg)
author: degriz

comments.content:
I’m guessing the original font was a bit wider based on the diffrent width of the horizontal and vertical stems?

Something like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060332im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/degriz_6290.jpg)
It is completely possible. If i recall it correctly “D” is original and the rest of characters were wider in original font (as you say). Sorry for not mentioning it before. I just forgot. :)

That is D3 Euronism from [Digital Dream Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060332/http:/homepage3.nifty.com/digitaldreamdesign/font.html). The interface is, to me at least, very irritating. Still - one can’t complain when getting a free gift, eh? Your font is the 24th from the left under “SELECT FONT”.

Thank you veeery much mate. I was going crazy.

Oh and by the way guys I’m really impressed by your skill ;) I browsed few other topics and i was stunned :)
